name: BeautyOnTheMove
description: Beauty services marketplace - Your Beauty On The Move
author: BeautyOnTheMove Team

infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: BeautyOnTheMove needs location access to find nearby beauty services and technicians.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: BeautyOnTheMove needs camera access to upload profile photos and service images.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: BeautyOnTheMove needs photo library access to select images for your profile and services.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: BeautyOnTheMove needs microphone access for voice messages and calls with technicians.
